biotools.summary:
Python package for the optical analysis of solar-thermal collectors and photovoltaic cells with arbitrary geometry.

OTSun is a python package that uses the Monte Carlo Forward Ray Tracing for the optical analysis of Solar Thermal Collectors and Solar Cells.

bioschemas.name: OTSun
